channel.title: Helppp!
channel.description: on testscape im positive there is a command to max you levels is anyone aware of what it is or how i modify my level ive tried cahnging and re-compiling it but it doesnt work :)

item.title: Helppp!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

try this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

that is only for if your an owner

change the 3 to 2 for admin and to a 1 for mods and just delete the && playerRights >= 3
if you want everybody to be able to do it.

Read full topic
